dijordan.model

Class SelectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dijordan.model.SelectionManager

  • public class SelectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for knowing which cards are selected in the game.

    All controllers operating over PyramidGame must be aware of this class to ensure proper operation. Creation date: (1/6/02 9:47:15 PM)
